title: Gambler’s Dilemma
desc:
Post 1538
- Once played, this card becomes one of the four basic colors (<:rgby:1107167371048788028>). You must attempt to guess which color it becomes
- If correct, discard 5 cards, if incorrect, draw 3 (draw 5 or discard 3 if the **__wtf__** modifier is in play)
- You may instead spend a turn to discard this card
